title: Great 1 bed / 1 bath! We Love Pets! Ask about our Pet Policy
posting_body: ['-- Gardenwood Apartments --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1340', 'Apartment:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '685 sq ft', 'Nestled in 35 acres of wooded landscape, Gardenwood is conveniently located in close proximity to Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport with easy access to I-75 and I-285.', 'We offer spacious 1, 2, and 3 garden-style apartments, featuring walk-in closets, wood-burning fireplaces, sunrooms with ceiling fans, and a multitude of other luxury features.', 'Please call for an appointment today!', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for each pet.', 'The weight limit is 50 pounds per pet.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please contact leasing office for complete pet policy details.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '● 24hr.', 'Emergency maintenance', '● Business Center', '● Cabana', '● Clubhouse', '● Condition very good', '● Corporate Housing', '● Fitness Center', '● Green and flowered areas', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Lounge', '● Nature Trails', '● On Marta Busline', '● On-Site Maintenance', '● Organized Activities', '● Package Service', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Two pools', '● Vintage Building', '● Walking/Biking Trails', '● Well maintained grounds', 'Apartment features include:', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '1110 Garden Walk Blvd', 'College Park, GA 30349', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A049CD944FC74D']
